bike.description: Schwinn N’Litened Aluminum with Comfort-Tuned geometry for internal gear hub

components.description: SR Suntour NEX 4110 suspension fork, 63mm travel with preload
Schwinn approved forged alloy, 38t ring with dual chainguard
Schwinn approved double wall alloy 32 hole
Shimano Nexus 7-speed rear, Formula sealed mechanism front with QR(F), Shimano Nexus 7-speed rear, Formula sealed mechanism front with QR(R)
Alloy adjustable rise, 90mm extension, 25.4 quill with QR accessory attachment face plate
Schwinn Bio-Tuned Ergonomic dual-density with fabric cover
Comfort Tuned Plus two-tone with Schwinn Super Soft foam and coil spring rails
Alloy suspension with micro adjust clamp, 26.8
Shopping bag, fenders, rear alloy rack, chain cover, bell, kickstand and alloy QR seat binder
